column2: "... Okay, let's try this again."
"First, you don't remember your name."
"Yup."
"You don't know where you came from."
"Yup!"
"And finally, you don't know who you are."
"Yup! Yup!"
"Anmesia isn't something to be proud of!"
"... I'm sorry."
"Seriously."
"So many crazy things happened, my head feels like it's about to explode! There's this kid that's got no memory whatsoever..."
"And then there's that weird monster... It might be better if I let the police handle all of this."
"But he did shield me that one time... It wouldn't be right to abandon him after that."
"... Of course I can't do that."
"Hitsugi?"
"Stop it with those puppy dog eyes! There's no use crying over spilt milk. Let's just roll with this."
"He looks exactly like the avatar I use in PSO2... This can't be just a coincidence."
"I'll have to investigate to see if this is related to PSO2 in any way."
"It's my job as a member of the Mother Cluster!"
"As a chosen member of the SNS group Mother Cluster, my job is to investigate the occurence of bugs inside the game PSO2."
"This is my obligation and duty."
"Which is why I have to do this."
"Not having a name is inconvenient, really. I'm trying to think of something good, but... What do you think? What would you wanna be called?"
"Nothing. Call me whatever you want."
"Anything, huh... What should I call you."
"Hmm... You look like something out of a myth... Alright!"
"How about \"Forseti?\""
"No."
"That was blunt! Didn't you say I can call you what I want! Geez..."
"\"Hermod!\""
"No."
"\"Heimdall!\""
"Nope."
"Maybe."
"The last one wasn't that bad! Aaaah come on, there's no time left! I'm needed at the Student Council!"
"Uh, er, umm... \"Aru\" then! As in the Japanese verb \"to be!\""
"...Aru? Aru... Aru! That's good! My name is Aru then!"
"Eeh, isn't that a bit too simple...? \"Gawain\" would sound better..."
"Aru! Aru! I'm Aru!"
"You're so stubborn... Oh well. At least you like it."
"Whoa, I'm gonna be late for anime school! Well then, Aru, I'm going to go out for a bit. Make sure you behave!"
"By chance, if the Dorm Leader comes, say that you're Hitsugi Yasaka's little brother."
"Brother?"
"Yes, Brother! I'm your older sister. You got it? Now repeat it."
"I'm big sis's little brother."
"Good! Now, remember to behave I'll come back as soon as I'm done, okay?"
"What? Something wrong?"
"Take care, Big Sis."
"...I-I'm going now."
"...It's been a while since I heard those words."
"Well, I'll let him stay for a while. ...I've always wanted a little brother."
"Everything seems to be going smoothly so far. It feels like we're using this as an excuse to peep, but it's for honest data. Can't be helped, I suppose."
"I'll continue visualizing the information. Hehe! I can't wait for the next scene--"
"1. Peeping is bad."
"2. How do you do this?"
"No, no! We're not peeping at all! I said so before--it's all for honest data! Honest. Data. Honestly!"
"The data we received just so happens to be awkward stuff. It's not like I'm doing it on purpose!"
"Fragments of information were sent from the links you've established. All I have to do is to piece it together."
"We're still performing research on the link. We won't know more unless more data is collected, and that's what we're doing it for!"
"Oh, and if we happen to meet Hitsugi again... this is our little secret. She's at a sensitive age, you know."
